name: roblox develop/create dark theme
description:
this style adds the dark theme onto the create tabs (https://www.roblox.com/develop etc)
it uses roblox's default dark theme colours so it should flow well with the rest of the site
additional_info:
changelogs

1.3 - fixed color scheme on firefox, colours should be consistent on all browsers now (possibly buggy)
1.2 - complete rewrite
1.1 - minor bug fixes
1.0 - release
